verses.text: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w upon|strong="H5329"\w* me, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, according \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* lovingkindness: According \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* tender mercies blot out \w my|strong="H1732"\w* transgressions.
Wash me thoroughly \w from|strong="H5030"\w* mine iniquity, \w And|strong="H5030"\w* cleanse me \w from|strong="H5030"\w* my sin.

\w For|strong="H2617"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* know \w my|strong="H4229"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*; \w And|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H4229"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* ever before \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

Against \w thee|strong="H7235"\w*, \w thee|strong="H7235"\w* \w only|strong="H7235"\w*, \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w*, \w And|strong="H2403"\w* done \w that|strong="H2403"\w* \w which|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H7235"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* sight; \w That|strong="H2403"\w* thou mayest \w be|strong="H2403"\w* justified \w when|strong="H7235"\w* thou speakest, \w And|strong="H2403"\w* \w be|strong="H2403"\w* clear \w when|strong="H7235"\w* thou judgest.

Behold, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* was brought \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* iniquity; \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* did \w my|strong="H3045"\w* mother conceive \w me|strong="H5048"\w*.

Behold, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* desirest truth \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inward parts; \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* hidden part \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* wilt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* know wisdom.

Purify me \w with|strong="H5771"\w* hyssop, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* clean: Wash me, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* whiter than snow.

\w Make|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* hear joy \w and|strong="H2451"\w* gladness, \w That|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones which \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w hast|strong="H3045"\w* broken may rejoice.
Hide thy face \w from|strong="H2891"\w* my \w sins|strong="H2398"\w*, \w And|strong="H2398"\w* blot out \w all|strong="H2398"\w* mine iniquities.

Create \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w And|strong="H8085"\w* renew \w a|strong="H3068"\w* right spirit within \w me|strong="H8085"\w*.

Cast \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; \w And|strong="H6440"\w* take \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* holy Spirit \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H2318"\w* \w unto|strong="H7307"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* joy \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* salvation; \w And|strong="H3820"\w* uphold \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* teach transgressors \w thy|strong="H3947"\w* ways; \w And|strong="H6440"\w* sinners \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* converted \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* bloodguiltiness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* God \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; \add And\add* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* sing aloud \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, open \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* lips; \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H1870"\w* show forth \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* praise.

\w For|strong="H7442"\w* \w thou|strong="H3956"\w* delightest not \w in|strong="H8668"\w* sacrifice; else would \w I|strong="H6666"\w* give \w it|strong="H6666"\w*: \w Thou|strong="H3956"\w* hast no pleasure \w in|strong="H8668"\w* burnt-offering.

\w The|strong="H5046"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H6310"\w* God \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken spirit: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* contrite \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, thou wilt \w not|strong="H6605"\w* despise.

Do good \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* good \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* Zion: Build \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls \w of|strong="H2077"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* wilt thou delight \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* righteousness, \w In|strong="H7665"\w* burnt-offering \w and|strong="H2077"\w* whole burnt-offering: \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* bullocks \w upon|strong="H7307"\w* thine altar.
